ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
CodeDisplay
Q3-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q3-2Mild (Feels life is not worth living, but expresses no wish to die, e.g., “I don’t care if I live or die”) and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q3-3Mild (Feels life is not worth living, but expresses no wish to die, e.g., “I don’t care if I live or die”) and Occasional
Q3-4Mild (Feels life is not worth living, but expresses no wish to die, e.g., “I don’t care if I live or die”) and Much of the time
Q3-5Mild (Feels life is not worth living, but expresses nowish to die, e.g., “I don’t care if I live or die”) and Almost all the time
Q3-6Moderate (Wishes to be dead; thoughts of dying, but no specific plan or intent, e.g., “If I got hit by a bus, I wouldn’t care,” “I’d like to go to sleep and never wake up”) and Occasional
Q3-7Moderate (Wishes to be dead; thoughts of dying, but no specific plan or intent, e.g., “If I got hit by a bus, I wouldn’t care,” “I’d like to go to sleep and never wake up”) and Much of the time
Q3-8Moderate (Wishes to be dead; thoughts of dying, but no specific plan or intent, e.g., “If I got hit by a bus, I wouldn’t care,” “I’d like to go to sleep and never wake up”) and Almost all the time
Q3-9Severe (Clear suicidal plan or intent; suicidal gesture, e.g., taking a few sleeping pills) and Occasional
Q3-10Severe (Clear suicidal plan or intent; suicidal gesture, e.g., taking a few sleeping pills) and Much of the time
Q3-11Severe (Clear suicidal plan or intent; suicidal gesture, e.g., taking a few sleeping pills) and almost all of the time"4
Q3-12Very severe (Attempts at suicide) and Occasional
Q3-13Very severe (Attempts at suicide) and Much off the time
Q3-14Very severe (Attempts at suicide) and Almost all of the time

description.value: ValueSet including Q3 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.

display.value: Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
